}, { key:Rand, value: 'Yemen', countryCode: 'ye' }, { key:Rand, value: 'Zambia', countryCode: 'zm' }, { key:Rand, value: 'Zimbabwe', countryCode: 'zw' }, ]; const ProgressBar = () => ( ); class BasicsInformations extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {...DEFAULT_STATE}; } async componentDidMount() { try { const {data} = await API.getEditProfilValues(); if (data && data.warnings === true) this.setState({warnings: data.warnings}); const newState = data.findProfil; if (data.findProfil) { this.setState({...newState}, () => { console.log(this.state); }); } } catch (error) { console.error(error); } } handleSave = async(props) => { this.props.nextSection(); try { const data = await API.updateEditProfilValues(this.state); if (Array.isArray(data.warnings) && data.warnings.length) this.setState({warnings: data.warnings}); else this.setState({save: true}); } catch (error) { console.error(error); } }; handleChange = (e, { value, id }) => { this.setState({ [id]: value }); }; render() { return (

Complete Basics Informations
) } } export default BasicsInformations;
